segments.text: By amenities , exactly what do you mean , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , the things that are free , like the soap and the shampoo .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , I got it . You've already run out of all your amenities ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I still have plenty left , even if I took three baths a day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm more confused now than before . How is there a problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to take home some souvenirs !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , finally I understand . You would like souvenirs !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , souvenirs that I can take home and add to my collection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it's souvenirs you want , sir , just visit our souvenir shop . It has everything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? Whoever heard of paying for hotel souvenirs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem at all , sir . Housekeeping will deliver you all the amenities you like in a bit .
segments.speaker: S2
